part1.title: Simplicity
part1.content: With our IT solution, we offer a simplified course management for both company tutors and school tutors.

part2.title: Efficiency
part2.content: We propose a solution that allows trainee supervisors to quickly manage reports and internship management.

part3.title: Ergonomics
part3.content: With a web-enabled solution on all devices, we offer a new practical and intuitive method for managing internships.

activation.subject: Request to activate your account
activation.title: Your account is ready!
activation.content: Your user account is created! You can start using it in a few moments but first, please confirm your registration and complete your personal information by clicking on the link below.

confirmation.subject: Confirmation of activation of your account
confirmation.title: Creation of a validated account!
confirmation.content: Congratulations! The creation of your account is confirmed, you can now log in!

delete.subject: Disabling Your Account
delete.title: Your account has been deleted
delete.content: Your manager-stage.eu account has been deleted. For more information, contact the administrator.

question.subject: A questionnaire asks your attention
question.title: A questionnaire asks your attention
question.content: New questionnaires are available, you can access them from now on.

update_survey_notification.subject: IMPORTANT: filling out questionnaires
update_survey_notification.title: The Questionnaires have been updated ...
update_survey_notification.content: Our questionnaire has been updated, if you have already completed one or more questionnaires, you will have to recomplet them. Thank you for your understanding

reactivation.subject: Your account has been restored!
reactivation.title: Your account has been restored!
reactivation.content: Congratulations! You can sign in to your {app_html_link} account again!

reponse_question.subject: Questionnaire validated!
reponse_question.title: Your questionnaire has been validated!
reponse_question.content: One of your questionnaires has been validated by the school tutor.

forgotten_password.subject: Forgot your password ?
forgotten_password.title: Changing your password
forgotten_password.content: You have forgotten your passwords and have a request to change it. All this happens by clicking on this button!

add_post.value: {Name_user} has published an accessible article on your Timeline

complete_survey.value: One of your questionnaires was completed

validate_survey.value: One of your questionnaires has been validated

update_survey.value: The questionnaires were updated and responses to the deleted questionnaires
